a.aria-label: Read More About Report Card Requests

div.p: Elementary guardians can now request digital report cards from the Superintendent's Office.

a.aria-label: Read More About Health Information - Coronavirus

div.p: The Washington Department of Health has released some information regarding the Coronavirus.

a.aria-label: Read More About Highly Capable Testing Starts Soon

div.p: Sunnyside School District will be offering highly capable programs for qualifying students in grades K-12. All potential students will need to be screened and tested in order to qualify.
